name: Resolved
description: Issue has been fully addressed and closed.

name: Workaround Provided
description: A temporary solution was given, but the underlying issue might persist.

name: Escalated
description: Issue sent to a higher tier or different department.

name: Duplicate Case
description: This case is a duplicate of an existing one.

name: No Action Required
description: Case closed without specific action, perhaps due to user error or misunderstanding.
